description: Manage AAD(Azure Active Directory) authentication of a virtual network gateway.

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway aad assign
commands.summary: Assign/Update AAD(Azure Active Directory) authentication to a virtual network gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway aad assign --audience
                                   --gateway-name
                                   --issuer
                                   --resource-group
                                   --tenant
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network vnet-gateway aad assign --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVnetGateway --tenant MyAADTenantURI --audience MyAADAudienceId --issuer MyAADIssuerURI

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway aad remove
commands.summary: Remove AAD(Azure Active Directory) authentication from a virtual network gateway.
examples: az network vnet-gateway aad remove --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVnetGateway

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway aad show
commands.summary: Show AAD(Azure Active Directory) authentication of a virtual network gateway.
examples: az network vnet-gateway aad show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVnetGateway

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway aad wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
